MS MCQs

    Create and manage Cognitive Services

    »

    1. You have an Azure Cognitive Service resource created. You want to prevent users from changing the properties. Which lock would you use?

      Read-Only

      Locked

      Delete


    2. What is the purpose of a metric on an Azure Cognitive Service resource?

      They provide severity levels for alerts.

      They are numerical values that describe some aspect of a system at a point in time.

      They notify users when events happen.


    3. How do you log time-stamped information for your resource?

      Link the resource to a CosmosDB instance.

      Create a metric and point the datasource property to an Azure blob storage location.

      Create a Log Analytics Workspace.
